## comparator.ts package

A TypeScript library for comparing values.

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[comparator(compareFn)](./comparator.ts.comparator.md)

</td><td>

Creates a `Comparator` from a custom comparison function.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[comparing(mapper, compareFn)](./comparator.ts.comparing.md)

</td><td>

Creates a `Comparator` that compares objects of type `T` by mapping them to values of type `U` using a provided mapping function and then comparing the mapped values using a given comparison function.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[nullsFirst(compareFn)](./comparator.ts.nullsfirst.md)

</td><td>

Creates a `Comparator` that considers `null` or `undefined` values as less than non-null values.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[nullsLast(compareFn)](./comparator.ts.nullslast.md)

</td><td>

Creates a `Comparator` that considers `null` or `undefined` values as greater than non-null values.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

<tr><td>

[dateComparator](./comparator.ts.datecomparator.md)

</td><td>

A `Comparator` for comparing `Date` objects in ascending order based on their time values.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[numberComparator](./comparator.ts.numbercomparator.md)

</td><td>

A `Comparator` for comparing numbers in ascending order.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[stringComparator](./comparator.ts.stringcomparator.md)

</td><td>

A `Comparator` for comparing strings using locale-specific ordering.
